description: The best drinks for Thanksgiving are often the simplest ones. This is because it's best to keep your guests full and happy, not drunk! The best cocktail for this time of year is Maple Old Fashioned. It tastes like fall in a glass, with all the flavors you would expect from maple syrup and spices used in cooking during this season.
name: Maple Old Fashioned
recipeIngredient: Orange peel, cocktail cherry, and ice for garnish

recipeInstructions.name: Combine the bourbon, maple syrup, and bitters in an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Shake well to chill and dilute ingredients with cold water. Strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh crushed ice.
recipeInstructions.text: Combine the bourbon, maple syrup, and bitters in an ice-filled cocktail shaker. Shake well to chill and dilute ingredients with cold water. Strain into a rocks glass filled with fresh crushed ice.

recipeInstructions.name: Garnish the drink by placing orange peel on top of the drink then with a maraschino cherry.
